title: fried pork with ginger and soy sauce
description: This low-calorie, stir-fried pork is quick and easy while still delivering on flavour, and helping you on your way to getting five a day. As part of an Intermittent diet plan, 1 serving provides:Your daily salty food3 of your 5 daily vegetable portionsThis meal provides 250 kcal per portion.
ingredients: 250g/9oz pork tenderloin, all visible fat removed, cut into chunks
15g/½oz fresh root ginger, cut into thin matchsticks
4 spring onions, cut into short lengths
